TITLE: Oki Route Guide
FERRY_DOZEN_VEHICLE_ONLY: * Vehicle fares apply to Ferry Dōzen only (Isokaze does not transport vehicles)
SERVICE_RESUMED: Normal service will be resumed from the following trip.
OFFLINE_TIMETABLE_ERROR: Failed to get timetable. It may not be the latest information because the timetable data that was last acquired is displayed.
LOAD_TIMETABLE_ERROR: Failed to get timetable. Please check the network connection status.
LOAD_STATUS_ERROR: Failed to get ships status. Please check the network connection status.
VEHICLE_FARE: Ferry Vehicle Transport Fares (One-way, Reservation Required)
INFANT_AGE_NOTE: * Children under 6 ride free (up to 1 child per adult)
INNER_ISLAND_INFANT_FREE_NOTE: * Infants under 1 year old ride free
INNER_ISLAND_INFANT_PAID_NOTE: * Pre-school children: 1 free per adult, 2nd child onward charged child fare
DISABILITY_FARE_APPLIES_TO_PERSON_AND_CA: * Disability fares apply to both the person and their caregiver
VEHICLE_LENGTH_NOTE: Vehicle fares are calculated based on total length. If any part of the vehicle extends beyond the standard dimensions, the fare is calculated based on the total length including the extended portion.
VEHICLE_DRIVER_TICKET_INCLUDED: Each vehicle includes one 2nd class ticket for the driver.
VEHICLE_NOTE_CONNECTED_VEHICLES: For connected vehicles or vehicles with any part extending beyond the front or rear, fares are charged based on the total length.
VEHICLE_NOTE_WIDTH_SURCHARGE: If the vehicle width or cargo exceeds 2.5m in width, an additional 15% of the vehicle fare is charged for every 25cm exceeded.
VEHICLE_NOTE_CATERPILLAR_VEHICLES: Caterpillar vehicles and road rollers must be loaded using a dolly.
VEHICLE_NOTE_SPECIAL_LOADING: However, if loading with a dolly is not possible due to vehicle weight, height, or other factors, we will discuss alternatives. In such cases, a 100% surcharge on the vehicle fare applies. For caterpillar vehicles and road rollers under 5m in length and under 2.5t in weight with rubber tires, standard vehicle fares apply.
VEHICLE_NOTE_SPECIAL_FEES: Additional fees may be charged for special costs incurred during vehicle loading, unloading, or during the voyage.
VEHICLE_NOTE_ROUND_TRIP_DISCOUNT: Round-trip vehicle ferry fares receive a 10% discount on the return trip for the same vehicle (within 14 days).
VEHICLE_NOTE_LIMITATIONS: Weight limit: 40t per vessel, Height limit: 3.8m per vessel, Minimum ground clearance: 15cm
VEHICLE_NOTE_SPECIAL_VEHICLES: Motorcycles with sidecars, bike trailers, and three-wheeled vehicles (trikes, etc.) are charged vehicle fares.
VEHICLE_NOTE_LOADING_PROCEDURE: Only the driver may handle vehicle loading. Passengers should board through the general boarding gate.
VEHICLE_NOTE_ROUNDING: Fares after surcharges or discounts are rounded up to the nearest 10 yen.
RAINBOW_JET_NO_VEHICLE: * Rainbow Jet does not transport vehicles
DISCOUNT_ROUND_TRIP_DESC: Applied when purchasing round trip tickets
DISCOUNT_GROUP_DESC: Applied for groups of 15 or more people
DISCOUNT_DISABILITY_DESC: Applied for passengers with disability certificates
NOTE_SEASONAL_SURCHARGE: Fares may change during peak seasons
NOTE_INNER_ISLAND_VEHICLE_10M_PLUS: * Vehicles 10m or longer on inter-island ferry: ¥3,000 + ¥500 per additional meter
DISABILITY_CERTIFICATE_REQUIRED: Disability certificate must be presented at the ticket office
DISABILITY_CAREGIVER_CONDITION: For caregivers: Only one caregiver recognized by our company as having caregiving ability for each disabled person may travel when traveling in the same boarding section and class as the disabled person
DISABILITY_VISUAL_IMPAIRED_CAREGIVER: For visually impaired persons: For each visually impaired person, up to one interpreter and one caregiver each, recognized by our company as having interpretation/caregiving ability, may travel when traveling in the same boarding section and class as the visually impaired person
DISABILITY_TYPE_1_DISCOUNT: Persons with Type 1 physical disabilities, Type 1 intellectual disabilities (Grade 'A' on the nursing certificate), and persons with mental disabilities: 50% discount on all classes and express fees for the person and one caregiver
DISABILITY_VISUAL_IMPAIRED_INTERPRETER_D: Visually impaired persons with Type 1 physical disabilities traveling with interpreter/caregiver: 50% discount on all classes and express fees for up to 2 people (1 interpreter and 1 caregiver) accompanying the visually impaired person
DISABILITY_TYPE_2_DISCOUNT: Persons with Type 2 physical disabilities and Type 2 intellectual disabilities (Grade 'B' on the nursing certificate): 50% discount on 2nd class passenger fares, special 2nd class room fees, and express fees
DISABILITY_BOARDING_PROCEDURE_NOTE: ※Please present your certificate during boarding procedures (ticket purchase). No discount available for vehicles. Please inquire for details.
DISABILITY_FARE_ROUNDING_NOTE: Fractions less than 10 yen in discounted fares will be rounded up.
NON_2ND_CLASS_RESERVATION_REQUIRED: * Classes other than 2nd class require reservations
RAINBOW_JET_ALL_SEATS_RESERVATION: * All seats require reservations. Fares include express fees.
INTERMEDIATE_STOP_INVALIDATES_TICKET: * Getting off at intermediate stops invalidates the remaining journey.
CALENDAR_UNAVAILABLE_MESSAGE: The operation calendar is currently unavailable.
FAVORITE_ROUTE_ALREADY_EXISTS: This route is already in favorites
FAVORITE_PORT_ALREADY_EXISTS: This port is already in favorites
FAVORITE_ERROR: An error occurred while managing favorites
FAVORITE_CLEAR_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete all favorites? This action cannot be undone.
SELECT_BOTH_PORTS: Please select both departure and destination
ABOUT_SERVICE_DESC: Oki Sea Route Information provides ferry and ship transportation information to the Oki Islands.
OKI_KISEN_DESC: Ferry and high-speed boat operator connecting Oki and mainland

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.addFavoritesHint: Add routes or ports to favorites and they will appear here
favorites.hint: Hint: Drag to reorder in edit mode
favorites.deleteRouteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this route from favorites?
favorites.deletePortConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this port from favorites?

history.title: Search History
history.noHistoryHint: Search for routes and your history will appear here
history.clearConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all search history? This action cannot be undone.

settings.clearCacheConfirmMessage: This will remove all cached data including timetables, status information, and fare data. The app will need to download fresh data when you use it next. Do you want to continue?
settings.clearAllDataDesc: Delete all favorites, history, and cache
settings.clearDataConfirmMessage: This will delete all data including favorites, search history, and cache. This action cannot be undone.
settings.reducedMotionDesc: Reduce motion for people sensitive to motion
settings.wifiOnlyDownloadsDesc: Download large files only on Wi-Fi
settings.analyticsEnabledDesc: Send anonymous data to improve the app
settings.locationPermissionDesc: Use current location to show nearest port
settings.highContrastDesc: Enhance color contrast for better visibility
settings.confirmClearCache: Are you sure you want to clear the cache?
settings.confirmResetSettings: This will reset all settings to default values. Are you sure?

error.pageNotFoundDesc: The page you're looking for may have been moved or deleted.
error.somethingWentWrongDesc: We're sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

news.title: News
news.pageDescription: Check the latest announcements, maintenance information, and campaign updates for Oki sea routes.
news.notFoundDescription: The news item may have been removed or the URL may be incorrect.

map.apiKeyMissing: Google Maps API key is not configured. Please set the API key in environment variables to use map features.

settings.title: Map Settings
settings.enableMapDesc: Display map in timetable and transit search

cancelRisk.title: Tomorrow's cancellation forecast
cancelRisk.disclaimer: Cancellation forecasts are this app's own estimates based on the past five years of service data and wave height forecasts. They are not official estimates from the operator, so please refrain from contacting the operator about these forecasts.
cancelRisk.suspendedMessage: There is no Rainbow Jet service scheduled tomorrow.

message.low: The cancellation risk is expected to be low.
message.lowish: The cancellation risk is expected to be slightly low.
message.caution: There is a possibility of cancellation. Please check the latest service status.
message.high: The cancellation risk is expected to be high. Please consider alternatives.
message.very_high: The cancellation risk is expected to be very high. Please secure alternatives.

settings.title: System Settings
settings.maintenanceModeDesc: When enabled, only administrators can access the site
settings.cacheEnabledDesc: Cache API responses to improve performance
settings.emailOnErrorDesc: Send email notifications on system errors
settings.emailOnDataUpdateDesc: Send email notifications on data updates
settings.twoFactorAuthDesc: Enable two-factor authentication for admin accounts
